coldStart.waking: Waking up server... this might take a moment.

error.defaultMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.unexpectedError: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

apiErrors.INVALID_TOKEN: Your session has expired. Please sign in again
apiErrors.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to perform this action
apiErrors.TASK_NOT_FOUND: The requested task was not found
apiErrors.TAG_NOT_FOUND: The requested tag was not found
apiErrors.VALIDATION_ERROR: Please check your input and try again
apiErrors.CIRCULAR_REFERENCE: This move would create a circular reference
apiErrors.DUPLICATE_TAG: A tag with this name already exists
apiErrors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many requests. Please try again later
